bio: Celebrity chef Ozdemir Burak, who is popularly known as CZN Burak worldwide, has been hospitalised. The cooking sensation himself revealed it on Instagram on Sunday. Taking to his photo-sharing app, Burak shared a picture of himself sitting on a hospital bed in a blue surgical gown and a head cap.

recipes.name: Spicy Chicken Curry
recipes.cookingMethod: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add onions and sauté till golden brown. 3. Add spices and sauté for a minute. 4. Add chicken and cook till browned. 5. Add chopped tomatoes and cook till soft. 6. Add coconut milk and let it simmer for 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.cookingMethod: 1. Heat broth in a pot. 2. Heat oil in a pan. 3. Add onions and sauté till golden brown. 4. Add arborio rice and stir for a minute. 5. Add white wine and stir till it evaporates. 6. Add mushrooms and stir for a few minutes. 7. Add broth one ladle at a time and stir till it's absorbed. 8. Keep repeating till the rice is cooked. 9. Add parmesan cheese and stir till it's melted.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.cookingMethod: 1. Heat broth in a pot. 2. Heat oil in a pan. 3. Add onions and sauté till golden brown. 4. Add arborio rice and stir for a minute. 5. Add white wine and stir till it evaporates. 6. Add mushrooms and stir for a few minutes. 7. Add broth one ladle at a time and stir till it's absorbed. 8. Keep repeating till the rice is cooked. 9. Add parmesan cheese and stir till it's melted.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.cookingMethod: 1. Heat broth in a pot. 2. Heat oil in a pan. 3. Add onions and sauté till golden brown. 4. Add arborio rice and stir for a minute. 5. Add white wine and stir till it evaporates. 6. Add mushrooms and stir for a few minutes. 7. Add broth one ladle at a time and stir till it's absorbed. 8. Keep repeating till the rice is cooked. 9. Add parmesan cheese and stir till it's melted.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.cookingMethod: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add beef sirloin and cook till browned. 3. Remove beef from pan. 4. Add onions and sauté till golden brown. 5. Add mushrooms and sauté for a few minutes. 6. Add beef back to the pan. 7. Add sour cream and let it simmer for 10 minutes. 8. Serve with egg noodles.
